channel.title: [317] Smite + Special Attack = Fail?
channel.description: I am trying to get smite to fully work atm. If you're just regularly hitting someone it will drain their prayer, but if you use the special attack on a weapon it won't drain their prayer, how can I make it where even using a special attack drains their prayer?

item.title: [317] Smite + Special Attack = Fail?
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

I am trying to get smite to fully work atm. If you’re just regularly hitting someone it will drain their prayer, but if you use the special attack on a weapon it won’t drain their prayer, how can I make it where even using a special attack drains their prayer?
